name: Fly Really Fast
description:
Fly Really Fast is an infinite runner (or to be more accurate, infinite flier) in which your objective is simply to fly really fast.

Dodge asteroids as you collect energy points to boost your speed. Fly as fast and as far as you can, and then later, use those points to buy new ships for future attempts. Also, keep an eye out for shield power-ups to give yourself a little breathing room while you tear through the cosmos.
